metadata.title: evo IRM-1 Rechargeable Sonic Toothbrush, Marvel Iron Man Electric Toothbrush for Adults, Electric Toothbrush with 4 Toothbrush Heads & Charger Included
features: [What's Included] The IRM-1 bundle includes 1 rechargeable handle, 4 plaque defense brush heads, 1 arc reactor charging base, 1 USB adapter plug, 1 USB power cord, and 1 free gift.

[Interactive Experience] Immerse yourself into the world of Iron Man with the collector's edition EVO IRM-1 Sonic Electric Toothbrush. From the unboxing experience to daily use, the electronic toothbrush features an innovative and beautiful design reflective of Stark Industries' technology.
[Professional Quality] The IRM-1 delivers a premium clean from the comfort of your home. The soft bristle toothbrush is ideal for a gentle cleaning of the enamels and gums.

[Multiple Modes] Up to 40,000 vibrations per minute, our ultrasonic toothbrush offers 4 modes of cleaning power: Standard, Sensitive, Teeth Whitening, and Deep Clean. A 2-minute toothbrush timer with 30 second interval pauses also helps to ensure even cleaning throughout.

[Smart Bristle Technology] Leave the guesswork out of your oral hygiene routine. The blue center bristles fade to white after 90 days of use as an additional reminder to swap the replacement toothbrush heads.
description: Marvel has always inspired our collective imaginations with visionary concept technologies that might one day be possible in our world. Looking to the future, EVO partnered with Marvel to create the IRM-1 Rechargeable Sonic Toothbrush: a collectorsâ€™ limited edition Iron Man ultrasonic toothbrush for fans of all ages. The IRM-1 pushes the boundaries of the automatic toothbrush by combining premium features with creative easter eggs to surprise fans throughout their brushing experience, beginning with unboxing. Fans are met with a voice, welcoming them to the Stark Industry vault as the IRM-1 is revealed. The ergonomically-designed rechargeable handle features a glowing power indicator with four mode control buttons below: Standard, Sensitive, Whitening, and Deep Clean. An attached brush head is designed to help keep teeth, gums, and mouth fresh, delivering 40,000 vibrations per minute. A built-in smart timer guides your brushing experience to completion, and an Iron Man arc reactor charging base powers up the handle for ultimate plaque-fighting strength.
